original_text: When Jesus had again crossed over by boat to the other side of the lake, a large crowd gathered around him while he was by the lake.
korean_text: 예수께서 배를 타시고 다시 맞은편으로 건너가시니 큰 무리가 그에게로 모이거늘 이에 바닷가에 계시더니

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had again crossed over by boat
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 다시 배를 타고 건너셨을 때

sentences.original_text: to the other side of the lake
a large crowd gathered around him
while he was by the lake
